section.title: Description
section.p: This class contains attributes related to contrast media administation associated with this Rad/Nuc Med exam.

stentry.p: Identifies the contrast agent(s) associated with this Rad/Nuc Med exam. Possible values are Ionic Iodinated; Non-ionic Iodinated; Gadolinium; Cholecystographic; Gastrografin; Barium; unspecified contrast media; etc.
